name: Second Hazardous Course
description: Hardcore platformer, the plot of which tells about the subjects who are trained in the complex hazardous course for unknown purposes, which will be learned from in-game stories and records.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows: 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (x64) Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6400 2,12GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 3800 Series 512 Mb DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Realtek HD Audio
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows: 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (x64) Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E7300 2,66GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GT630 1024 Mb DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Realtek HD Audio
